act that is active in the sense of a warning.From the name, a state of the guerrilla was said to be in my edition and the choice of the father of the survival, as it is what the sentence and the ability indicated, or the greatest of what he said, He walked with him, and this is the face of his exports, too, by his interpretation of description.Al -Nahhas said: The distraction was deleted from a vow, even if the fire has the meaning of the proportions, meaning a warning and it may be said in the abundance of distraction in which there is no one in it, so what is said in it His Excellency said that the mercy of God is close to the good.Sleeping or like it.Ibn Zaid said: The Prophet is intended for the Prophet ﷺ It was said, and it is erected by adding a verb, that is, he claims a vow or its grace.And Ibn Zayd said: What is meant by the Prophet ﷺ was said, and it is erected by adding a verb, too The verb is first, and so if it was made a call and the words are the opposite of your saying that the matter is like that, so -and -so, and it was said that it is on this state From bidding about the interpretation.Abi, Ibn Abi and Ibn Abla, read a “vow” by raising that he was informed
